name: Star Option
description:
This is a game I put together in a couple weeks a few years back, when I was experimenting with ideas like old space shooters. Ultimately, I was able to create something that was unique and gave a fair amount of fun.

This game was made in Multimedia Fusion 2.

Controls:

The mouse moves your ship; center your mouse to respawn

Left Click to shoot, release left click for a second and then press to create a 'barrier burst', a nearby shield which destroys all enemies and projectiles it collides with

Right Click to 'Option Change', which will change the formation of your shot options.

left/right/up/down to aim your main ship in different directions.
